Title: Pilot
Writer: George Pelecanos (created by), David Simon (created by), George Pelecanos, David Simon
Actors: James Franco, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Gbenga Akinnagbe, Gary Carr
Plot: The Deuce is an upcoming American television drama series set in and around Times Square, New York , the series pilot began shooting in October 2015. The series was picked up in January 2016.
